page.title: 20TRANSPORT AND CREDITS
page.content: TRANSPORT The only services are bus services. Bristol Transport offer seven buses daily to and from Bristol, and two buses daily to and from Bath (with two extra on Fridays). A private local company runs one bus to and from Bath on Wednesdays, and another operates a weekly service to and from Chippenham on Fridays. Marshfield residents are thus heavily dependant on private transport, and many families have two cars. CREDITS The survey was a co_operative effort by many people living in Marshfield. It was co-ordinated by the Marshfield Women's Institute, with assistance from members of the Marshfield and District Local History Society. Thanks to Marshfield Primary School for the loan of the computer and to Mike, Russell & John. Acknowledgements: V. RUSSETT.
